summary: This document contains an email exchange between Alexa N. Staley and Jes Staley regarding a summer school program on gravitational wave astronomy that Alexa is considering. Jes Staley suggests that Alexa send the details to Jeffrey for his opinion on whether the course is worthwhile.

persons.name: Alexa N. Staley
persons.context: Alexa is inquiring about a summer school program and is seeking advice from Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is advising Alexa on a summer school program and is communicating with Jeffrey about it.

persons.name: Jeffrey
persons.context: Jeffrey is mentioned as someone whose opinion is sought regarding the summer school program.

connections.description: Jes Staley is advising Alexa on her educational opportunities.
Jes Staley is communicating with Jeffrey about Alexa's educational pursuits.

Jes Staley is advising Alexa on whether the program is worthwhile.
Jeffrey's opinion is sought regarding the summer school program.
